description: Summary metrics about containers running on Kubernetes nodes and mainline kubernetes statistics

targets.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$node$/ AND "fstype" != 'nfs' AND "fstype" != 'iso9660' AND "path" = '/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$node$/ AND "fstype" != 'nfs' AND "fstype" != 'iso9660' AND "path" = '/app') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)

panels.title: Total Pods Lag Between DC and DR

title: K8s Cluster Summary
